Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and potentially increase your profits by a substantial margin. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $1,100,000 for this exceptional product. This price reflects not only its high market value but also the unique opportunity to secure it at a favorable rate compared to the standard price of $1,200,000. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a game-changer for your company and exploring the details of our transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this exciting opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
